<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Return true if this alloca is legal for promotion.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This is true if there are only loads, stores, and lifetime markers</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="comment">/// (transitively) using this alloca. This also enforces that there is only</Highlight></CodeLine>
